question: How do you remove a duplicate LinkedIn account?
answer_new_1: Find both of your accounts and close the one you don't want. Then, 48 hours after the account is closed, add the email address from the closed account to the one you kept open.
answer_new_2: In the account management section of the account that you want to keep, find the duplicate account link, and then select the account to be closed
answer_new_3: Contact LinkedIn Support, and select the "duplicate account" option. A LinkedIn representative will then remove the duplicate account.
